name: Tatevik Petrosyan
title: Freelance Product / UI/UX / Icon Designer
bio: I'm a versatile designer with over 10 years of experience spanning UI/UX design, icon design, and interior design. Trained at the Florence Design Academy in Italy and the Academy of Fine Arts in Armenia, I bring a unique blend of European design sensibility and creative expertise to every project.
bioExtended: My journey from interior design to digital product design has given me a deep understanding of space, user flow, and visual harmony. I specialize in creating intuitive interfaces, custom icon systems, and cohesive design solutions. Whether it's a mobile app, web platform, or comprehensive design system, I focus on crafting experiences that are both beautiful and functional.
certifications: Microsoft Innovation Center - UX/UI Design Course
